Recipe.header_description: The sweet frangipane filling with almonds is a lovely addition and really brings these little tarts to whole new flavour level.
Recipe.ingredients: 3/ 4 cup almond meal 1 1/2. tbsp plain flour 1/ 4 cup sugar sog unsalted butter 1largeegg 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 2 sheets of puff pastry 2 to 3 apples sliced extra butter melted and 1 tbsp sugar
Recipe.step1: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C. Place the pastry on a lined oven tray to thaw. Cut 1 sheet into 4 squares and prick all over with a fork to stop it puffing up too much and other one I choose to have it as a round circle.
Recipe.step2: For frangipane filling, cream the sugar and butter together until light. Add egg and mix to combine. Finally add the almonds, extract to combine
Recipe.step3: Spread the frangipane evenly into the puff pastry sheets leaving 1 cm from the edges. Arrange the apples slices in a pretty petal pattern.
Recipe.step4: Brush with melted butter and sprinkle with the extra sugar. Bake for about 20-25 minutes till the pastry is puffed and golden around the edges. Drizzle with honey and serve with dollop of double cream.
